entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers or drizzle. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few showers or periods of drizzle ending late this evening then cloudy. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early in the evening then changing to periods of light snow after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late in the evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
